actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to clarify certain definitions used in the Shipping Act, 1916.

summary.text: Amends the Shipping Act, 1916, to redefine the term "person" to include corporations, partnerships, and associations existing under, or authorized by the laws of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico. States that corporations organized under the laws of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico shall be deemed citizens of the United States for purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to clarify certain definitions used in the Shipping Act, 1916.
